# PHS 7045

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis 
#| warning: false

# List of pages to be rendered
fns <- read.csv("pages.csv")

# Moving the data
for (i in 1:nrow(fns)) {

    # Making sure the path exists
    tryCatch(dir.create(
        dirname(fns$urlpath[i]),
        showWarnings = FALSE,
        recursive = TRUE
        ), error = function(e) e)    

    # Getting the files
    tocopy <- strsplit(fns$copy[i], split = ";")[[1]]
    for (toc in tocopy) {
        if (file.exists(toc))
            file.copy(
                from      = toc,
                to        = file.path(dirname(fns$urlpath[i])),
                recursive = file.info(toc)$isdir[1]
                )
    }

    file.copy(from = fns$path[i], to = fns$urlpath[i])
    cat(sprintf("-  %s ([link](%s))\n\n", fns$name[i], fns$urlpath[i]))

}
```
